document.full_text: court documents and an exclusive interview with the father of an 11-year-old girl who the police say was the victim of repeated gang rapes in east texas paint a grim portrait of an episode that lasted many months.
document.title: 3-month nightmare emerges in rape inquiry
lines_and_colors: court documents and an exclusive interview with the father of an 11-year-old girl who the police say was the victim of repeated gang rapes in east texas paint a grim portrait of an episode that lasted many months.
